titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Committal Service Shelter Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Committal Service Shelter Act of 2019

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the use of grant amounts awarded under the Veterans Cemetery Grants Program for construction of fully enclosed committal service shelters in certain State veterans' cemeteries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Department of Veterans Affairs Committal Service Shelter Act of 2019
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to make grants for the construction of fully enclosed committal service shelters in veterans' cemeteries owned by states that have (1) one or fewer veterans' cemeteries that are federally funded, and (2) one or fewer national cemeteries under the control of the VA with space available to accommodate remains.
